result.name: greenspaces-udp-june-2006-rochdale-borough-council
result.notes:
Greenspaces are a series of allocations relating to the Rochdale UDP June 2006.  These allocations cover planning policies on Greenspace (Chapter  14) and Countryside and the Rural Economy (Chapter 15):
G/3 – Protection of existing recreational open space (allocations of recreational open space inc schools)
G/7 – Protection of allotments (allocations of allotments)
G/8 – Greenspace corridors (allocations of greenspace corridors)
G/9 – Stanney Brook Corridor and Park (allocation of Stanney Brook Corridor and Park)
RE/7 – Recreational management areas (allocations of recreational management areas)

organization.name: rochdale-borough-council
organization.title: Rochdale Borough Council
organization.description: (also known as Rochdale Metropolitan Borough Council)

result.title: Greenspaces (UDP June 2006)  - Rochdale Borough Council
